# ion-footer



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### translucent

boolean

If true, the footer will be translucent.
Note: In order to scroll content behind the footer, the `fullscreen`
attribute needs to be set on the content.
Defaults to `false`.


## Attributes

#### translucent

boolean

If true, the footer will be translucent.
Note: In order to scroll content behind the footer, the `fullscreen`
attribute needs to be set on the content.
Defaults to `false`.
